name: Jenova
description:
Welcome to Jenova. A unique design and promotions agency in the heart of Henley-on-Thames. Our multi-disciplinary attitude enables us to cover all your design needs under one roof. Our specialist design and promotions teams work with a wide range of clients both locally and worldwide. We value our clients and pride ourselves on retaining relationships which is reflected in the many referrals we receive.
We offer a responsive service with regular contact and no unexpected or unnecessary charges. Thereâ€™s always time for discussion and we will assist in making your business a success in any way we can.
